backend/main.mo: Defines a simple canister with a query method returning the caller's principal.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend files including components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining custom CSS variables for colors, layout, and theme behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component showing a splash screen, header, landing page, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky header with logo and navigation including a chat call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component displaying an image with fallback text when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated full‑screen splash screen that fades out after a timed delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hook providing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hook performing the publish‑readiness query by calling checkCanisterStatus via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind stylesheet defining a warm coral/teal design system for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point configuring QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: React landing page with hero, feature cards, and UI elements, integrating a publish readiness check hook.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, feature requirements, known issues, and current planning metadata for Vibechat.
